thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Science Sun Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit to down 15 pct to up 15 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Science Sun Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit to down 15 pct to up 15 pct

organizations.name: beijing science sun pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Beijing Science Sun Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 15 percent to increase by 15 percent, or to be 219.6 million yuan to 297.2 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 258.4 million yuan
* Comments that expanded market and decreased costs as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ASu3zu
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
